dao-controlled-supply-desc: Mango DAO controls the vast majority of the MNGO supply which can only be unlocked via a DAO vote.
equal-price-desc: Everyone who participated in the MNGO sale paid the exact same price per MNGO token.
liquidity-incentives-desc: Earmarked for incentivizing market makers on Mango.
mango-dao-desc: The DAO controls the vast majority of the MNGO supply. If approved by the DAO it can be distributed for grants, airdrops or other uses.
mngo-desc: MNGO is the governance token of the Mango DAO and represents ownership of the protocol.
no-insider-deals-desc: No pre-sale. No VCs. Every participant had equal weight in the IDO.
public-sale-desc: The MNGO fair-launch IDO was created to capitalize the Insurance Fund.
team-desc: The people who brought Mango to life were given grants to incentivize further development of the protocol and product.
vested-grants-desc: There are multiple current MNGO grants for DAO contributors. All are approved by DAO vote and are openly displayed on our stats dashboard.
